attributes.action: indict George Galloway for bringing Parliament into disrepute, and to call for a full public inquiry into his involvement with the Mariam Appeal and the Oil for Food Scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2006, George Galloway MP appeared on Celebrity Big Brother. During the show, he was not working as an MP serving his constituents, but was still being paid by the taxpayer.
He behaved in what was construed by many to be an unsuitable manner, thus bringing Parliament into disrepute.
We, the undersigned, call for George Galloway to be indicted for his actions in the Big Brother house, and for his involvement in the Oil for Food program and the Mariam Appeal to be investigated in a full, independent, public inquiry

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
